reviews.review_msg: Ivor Winton is a crazy proffesor who is too in love with himself. He is more concerned about his villa in France than he is about his students. DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS IF YOU WANT TO HAVE A SOCIAL LIFE.

This course would be SOOO boring without Ivor. He is a painfully hard marker but his lectures make up for it. He is entertaining, funny and witty...don't let his loudness scare you...he actually cares about his students!!This is a very exciting class but is very fast paced keep up and you'll be fine
